AppIntro </--> MemoCutter An easy way to cut and resend audio memos and audio files. We need the WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE permission to be able to cut audios. How to load a file Look out for the share symbol over an audio file and choose this app as the target. Alternatively, you can browse your folders to choose a file manually. How to cut a file Use the range bar to define which part of the file you want to cut out. Press the bottom right button to cut out. Now you can instantly share your new audio files! Audio files The app gives you an overview over your audio files. You can delete a file by swiping it to the left. You can rename a file by long clicking an item. For your information, they are stored in the folder /AudioCutter. Combine audios Long click on the items you want to combine. Order is relevant. Then click the bottom right button.
